mapper.select:
SELECT
,
FROM tb_culpro_specialty ORDER BY itemCreateAt DESC

select
,
from tb_culpro_specialty WHERE SPECIALTY_NAME LIKE "%"#{value}"%" OR SPECIALTY_DESCRIBE LIKE "%"#{value}"%" OR SPECIALTY_ADDRESS_PRO LIKE "%"#{value}"%" OR SPECIALTY_ADDRESS_CITY LIKE "%"#{value}"%" OR SPECIALTY_ADDRESS_COUNTY LIKE "%"#{value}"%" OR SPECIALTY_ADDRESS LIKE "%"#{value}"%" OR itemCode IN (select HOSPITAL_CODE from tb_culpro_hosp, tb_culpro_hosp_specialty_ref WHERE HOSPITAL_NAME LIKE "%"#{value}"%" AND tb_culpro_hosp.itemCode=tb_culpro_hosp_specialty_ref.itemCode) ORDER BY itemCreateAt DESC

select
,
from tb_culpro_specialty ORDER BY itemCreateAt DESC LIMIT 5
